## EthersLiquity.depositCollateral() method

Adjust existing Trove by depositing more collateral.

**Signature:**

```typescript
depositCollateral(amount: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<TroveAdjustmentDetails>;
```

## Exceptions

Throws [EthersTransactionFailedError](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

